summary: Retools Skyrim\'s vampirism into something more closely resembling not stupid.
descriptionHtml:
Bethesda\'s vampires are dumb so I changed some things around until I was satisfied with what I had.

NOTE: This will not work with characters who are already vampires! You must create a new vampire when using this or shit will break!

[What This Mod Actually Does]
=The progression of vampirism is reversed. You now grow weaker the longer you go without feeding.
=Night for vampires begins an hour earlier.
=NPC\'s no longer go hostile at Stage 4
=Sunlight is much more deadly. Changes are as follows:
    Stage 1: Health/Stamina/Magic are docked 250 points and don\'t regenerate
    Stage 2: Health/Stamina/Magic are docked 350 points and don\'t regenerate
    Stage 3: Heatlh/Stamina/Magic are docked 450 points and don\'t regenerate
    Stage 4: Health/Stamina/Magic are docked 550 points and don\'t regenerate

=Resistances and Weaknesses are now as follows:
    Stage 1: 100% Resistance to Frost/100% Weakness to Fire
    Stage 2: 75% Resistance/150% Weakness to Fire
    Stage 3: 50% Resistance/175% Weakness to Fire
    Stage 4: 25% Resistance/200% Weakness to Fire

=Vampire Powers and Abilities are now as follow:

~Vampiric Drain~
    Stage 1: 40 points per second and is a zero-cost spell
    Stage 2: 20 points per second and is a once-a-day power
    Stage 3: 10 points per second and is a once-a-day power
    Stage 4: 5 points per second and is a once-a-day power

~Vampire\'s Servant~
    Stage 1: Level 50 and below for 5 minutes and is a lesser power
    Stage 2: Level 30 and below for 3 minutes and is a once-a-day power
    Stage 3: Level 20 and below for 1 minute and is a once-a-day power
    Stage 4: Level 10 and below for 30 seconds and is a once-a-day power

~Vampiric Strength~
    Stage 1: +40 Unarmed Damage
    Stage 2: +20 Unarmed Damage
    Stage 3: +10 Unarmed Damage
    Stage 4: +5 Unarmed Damage

~Vampire\'s Seduction~
    Calm level 50 and below for 30 seconds
